column2: Len : 2    PREFERRED WAY TO REPORT HEIGHT
OTE: HTINCHE2 was recoded to inches from reports of heights in feet and inches, meters and centimeters, or centimeters only. Heights in meters

column1: and centimeters first were converted to centimeters. For respondents who chose to report their height in metric units, a conversion factor was
applied of 0.393701 inches to 1 centimeter to produce a height in inches. HTINCHE2 was then rounded to the nearest integer and top coded at 75
inches and bottom coded at 55 inches.
